category: The category in which the parameter will be displayed.
displayName: User friendly name that can be displayed instead of the parameter key when using the tool.
required: Identifies mandatory input (this refers to 'optional' attribute in the schema).
keepOptional: Ensures that a parameter is always optional.
ipVersion: Ensures that a parameter is only displayed for specified IP version.
autoPopulate: Used to populate IP addresses in the 'Auto Populate' feature (this refers to the shortName property of the autoPopulationTypes in the schema).
displayIf: Restricts the parameter so it can only be displayed when the corresponding parameter is enabled.
validationPattern: Specified validation pattern (this refers to 'pattern' in the schema).
preventDuplicates: Identifies not allowed duplication of parameter values.
options: Predefined list of allowed parameter values (this refers to 'enum' in the schema).
keys: Keys where the value should be populated to the values Yaml file.
